mil6.1.4:1.1_2: netādiso aññatra ārambho ahosi nikkamo kilesayuddhaṁ maccusenaṁ vidhamanaṁ āhārapariggaho dukkarakārikā,
mil6.1.4:1.1_3: evarūpe parakkame kiñci assādaṁ alabhitvā tameva cittaṁ parihāpetvā evamavoca ‘na kho panāhaṁ imāya kaṭukāya dukkarakārikāya adhigacchāmi uttari manussadhammaṁ alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṁ,
mil6.1.4:1.1_4: siyā nu kho añño maggo bodhāyā’ti,
mil6.1.4:1.1_5: tato nibbinditvā aññena maggena sabbaññutaṁ patto,
mil6.1.4:1.1_6: puna tāya paṭipadāya sāvake anusāsati samādapeti.
mil6.1.4:3.1_1: kāraṇena tathāgato yāya paṭipadāya attanā nibbinno virattarūpo,
mil6.1.4:4.1_1: taṁyeva paṭipadaṁ paṭipajjitvā bodhisatto sabbaññutaṁ patto.
mil6.1.4:4.2_1: bodhisatto ativīriyaṁ karonto niravasesato āhāraṁ uparundhi.
mil6.1.4:4.4_0: So tena dubbalyena nāsakkhi sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇituṁ,
mil6.1.4:4.4_1: so mattamattaṁ kabaḷīkārāhāraṁ sevanto tāyeva paṭipadāya nacirasseva sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇi.
mil6.1.4:5.2_1: sāyeva paṭipadā sabbesaṁ tathāgatānaṁ sabbaññutañāṇappaṭilābhāya, neso, mahārāja, doso ārambhassa, na nikkamassa, na kilesayuddhassa,
mil6.1.4:5.2_2: yena tathāgato tasmiṁ samaye na pāpuṇi sabbaññutañāṇaṁ,
mil6.1.4:6.1_2: tena so pakkhahato vā bhaveyya pīṭhasappī vā asañcaro pathavitale.
mil6.1.4:6.2_0: Api nu kho, mahārāja, mahāpathaviyā doso atthi,
mil6.1.4:6.4_0: sadā paṭiyattā, bhante, mahāpathavī, kuto tassā doso?
mil6.1.4:6.6_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, neso doso ārambhassa, na nikkamassa, na kilesayuddhassa,
mil6.1.4:6.6_1: yena tathāgato tasmiṁ samaye na pāpuṇi sabbaññutañāṇaṁ,
mil6.1.4:6.6_2: atha kho āhārūparodhasseveso doso sadā paṭiyattā yevesā paṭipadā.
mil6.1.4:7.1_1: puriso kiliṭṭhaṁ sāṭakaṁ nivāseyya, na so taṁ dhovāpeyya, neso doso udakassa, sadā paṭiyattaṁ udakaṁ.
mil6.1.4:7.3_0: Evameva kho, mahārāja, neso doso ārambhassa, na nikkamassa, na kilesayuddhassa,
mil6.1.4:7.3_1: yena tathāgato tasmiṁ samaye na pāpuṇi sabbaññutañāṇaṁ,
mil6.1.4:7.3_4: tasmā tathāgato tāyeva paṭipadāya sāvake anusāsati samādapeti, evaṁ kho, mahārāja,
